Notes: A decorative background model that is meant to be placed around entire galaxies. It follows the camera's position, so it's not possible for the player to reach the end of the model, unlike atmosphere objects. Furthermore, the model uses a projection map matrix.

Obj_arg0.Name: Mirror Reflection Type
Obj_arg0.Description: Specifies whether to use a reflection model or not.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
